kvhc.util

Interface ISongRenderer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SoundPoolRenderer, SQLRenderer

    public interface ISongRenderer
    Interface to render a song. Classes implements this to ensure they have all the necessary functions to render a Song.
    Author:
    kvhc

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void loadSounds(java.util.ArrayList<Sound> soundList)
      Load sound from an ArrayList of Sound.
      void renderSong(Song song)
      Renders a whole song
      void renderSongAtStep(Song song, int step)
      Render song at a specific step.
